name: Omnara
tagline: Claude Code in your Pocket
description: Omnara frees Claude Code from the terminal. Start coding locally, then pick up instantly on web or mobile. Switch devices seamlessly, never lose progress. Get push notifications when agents need you and approve changes with one tap. SDK works with any AI agent

name: GoodsFox
tagline: Track competitor ads, traffic sources, and winning creatives
description: AI-powered website ad intelligence to see exactly how competitors drive traffic, run ads, and win customers‚Äîacross 49 countries and 10 ad channels.

name: DeepSeek-V3.1
tagline: Our first step toward the agent era
description: DeepSeek-V3.1 is a hybrid model that supports both thinking mode and non-thinking mode.

name: ViewMe
tagline: 3D Viewer Desktop App
description: ViewMe is a straightforward 3D viewer desktop app that can load and display Wavefront (.obj) 3D models with textures, lighting, and dynamic shadows. Perfect for previewing 3D models quickly and easily.

name: inZOI
tagline: Life simulation where every life becomes a story
description: Create your unique story by controlling and observing the lives of 'Zois'. Customize characters and build houses using easy-to-use tools to live the life of your dreams and experience the different emotions of life created by its deep and detailed simulation.

name: GitArsenal
tagline: From git clone to running code in one command
description: Stop wasting hours on environment setup. Our AI agent takes any GitHub repository and gets it running automatically, debugging every error, installing every dependency, and handling all the painful setup work that usually kills your coding momentum.

name: Musical Drones
tagline: Every run is life or death, outrun the drones to survive
description: Run or be hunted. Musical Drones turns your workout into a survival game‚Äîand a warning. Slow down, the drone locks on. Stop, it hunts. Built in protest of tech billionaires funding AI war machines, this app makes dystopia something you can feel.

name: ProfileSpider
tagline: One-click universal profile scraper
description: Extract professional profiles from any website in one click. AI-powered Chrome extension that builds contact lists, exports to your CRM or ATS, and saves hours of manual data entry.

name: Runway Game Worlds
tagline: Game Worlds is a step toward the next era of media
description: Explore endless worlds, characters and stories. All generated as you play. Join beta now.

name: PulseSync
tagline: All your body data, in one place
description: PulseSync‚ÄîYour smart health partner! Log water, sleep, weight & steps with ease. Enjoy goal tracking, insights, offline support & secure sync‚Äîall wrapped in a stunning dark/light design.

name: Groove Reads
tagline: Brainmaxxing, but make it groovy ‚ú®
description: Reading kinda mid? üëÄ Groove Reads bolds the first letters of words + lets you slide a disco ball to set your focus length ‚ú® Groove Reads ‚ú® the enemies-to-lovers arc of you vs. reading üìñüî• fall in love with reading againü™©üíò

name: Podzy
tagline: Turn any Newsletters into a Podcast to Go!
description: Introducing Podzy, an AI-Powered Podcast generator tool designed for busy professionals who want their favorite newsletters transformed into engaging podcasts directly from your Gmail. Built for busy minds who‚Äôd rather listen than scroll. Two clicks. Done.

name: Duple.ai
tagline: Access ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, Grok, and more in one place
description: One subscription. All AIs. Get ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, and Grok in one interface for just $5.99/month ‚Äî the most affordable AI hub.

name: Fastposterai
tagline: Design your poster in a second
description: Create stunning posters instantly using AI. Fast, easy, and professional results in seconds.

name: Ready Set Sim ‚Äì Sim Rig Builder
tagline: Build your dream sim racing rig with smart picker system
description: Ready Set Sim is the home for sim racers üöÄ Discover thousands of real builds on MySim, our social hub for rigs. üõ†Ô∏è Plan your setup with the smart Sim Rig Builder to guarantee compatibility. Less time researching, more time racing. Built by racers, for racers

name: LFM2-VL
tagline: On-device vision, now 2x faster
description: LFM2-VL is a new series of open-weight vision-language models from Liquid AI. Designed for on-device deployment, they offer up to 2x faster inference on GPU and come in 450M and 1.6B parameter sizes.

name: Clearo
tagline: Chaos in, clarity out. Organize your mind in seconds
description: Braindump anything. Clearo processes and organizes your raw input into actionable items (tasks, reminders, goals, events..) and assigns due dates, times, and repeat settings. Chat with Clearo to create entries or manage your powerful calendar and kanban board.

name: IsDown
tagline: Be the first to know when vendors go down
description: IsDown helps you monitor outages in all the cloud third-party services you use. Never miss when a service is down. 4400 services status available. Check out the new integrations ( Datadog, Zendesk, Rootly, Incident.io, etc ) and create your status page!

name: Habit fun
tagline: The most beautiful habit tracker with stunning visual grids
description: Beautiful habit tracker with stunning visual grids, already downloaded 96+ times with 20.6% conversion rate! Psychology-backed habit formation meets gorgeous design. Free download with premium features.

name: AI Fiesta
tagline: Get Answers from World's Top AI Models In One Chat
description: AI Fiesta lets you chat with top AI models like ChatGPT, Gemini Pro, Claude, Perplexity, Deepseek, and Grok ‚Äî all under one subscription. Compare model responses side-by-side in real-time and choose the best AI for every task.
